message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You wanted to split it evenly, but I think I'm worth more than you!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still a great negotiator!
You're not giving me enough, but I'll give you a chance to make it right!
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't expect me to give away too much!
I'm starting to get impatient, but I'll give you one more chance to make a fair offer!
I'm not giving in, I'll take a slightly bigger share this time!
Fine, I'll take what's fair, but don't expect me to keep making concessions!
